attributes.action: call on Post Office Ltd not to close the Christchurch Street, Fore Street, London Road and Norwich Road post offices in Ipswich.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Post Office Ltd has announced the closure of four post offices in Ipswich.

The branches proposed for closure are:

Christchurch Street, Fore Street, London Road and Norwich Road.

The people of Ipswich– especially those on low incomes or without access to the internet – deserve an accessible postal network.

This programme of closures is being managed from a remote office in Northern Ireland – how much local knowledge can really have gone into these decisions?

Royal Mail must be held to account and must be made to justify any closures. Please show your support for our local post offices in Ipswich by signing this petition.
